doc.title: The Guinness Game
doc.plot: Each week, several great achievers would attempt to break a world record on the show. Before each feat was attempted, three contestants would place bets on whether or not the person would do it successfully or not. The records were typically not of the outstanding kind. Examples included longest time walking on a rolling log, most quarters flipped off an elbow, skate-boarding in a U-channel the longest, and various track-and-field type actions.
